mapper.select: select mNUM from study where uNUM=#{param1} and MNAME=#{param2}
select count(*) from study where MNAME=#{param1}
select count(*) from meeting_study where mNum=#{param1} and uNum=#{param2}
select STATE from meeting_study where mNum=#{param1} and uNum=#{param2}
mapper.delete: delete from meeting_study where unum=#{param1} and mnum=#{param2} and state=10
delete from meeting_study where unum=#{param1} and mnum=#{param2} and state=20
mapper.select: select e.uNick,f.* from members e right outer join( select d.*, c.cnt from study d left outer join( select distinct a.mnum,nvl(b.cnts,'1') cnt from meeting_study a left outer join( select mnum, count(mnum)+1 cnts from meeting_study where state=20 group by mnum) b on a.mnum = b.mnum order by a.mnum) c on d.mnum = c.mnum order by d.mnum desc) f on e.unum=f.unum order by f.mnum desc
select nvl(STATE,'0') state from meeting_study right outer join dual on mNum=#{param1} and uNum=#{param2}

select e.uNick,f.* from members e right outer join( select d.*, c.cnt from study d left outer join( select distinct a.mnum,nvl(b.cnts,'1') cnt from meeting_study a left outer join( select mnum, count(mnum)+1 cnts from meeting_study where state=20 group by mnum) b on a.mnum = b.mnum order by a.mnum) c on d.mnum = c.mnum order by d.mnum desc) f on e.unum=f.unum where f.mName LIKE '%'||#{param1}||'%' order by f.mnum desc

select e.uNick,f.* from members e right outer join( select d.*, c.cnt from study d left outer join( select distinct a.mnum,nvl(b.cnts,'1') cnt from meeting_study a left outer join( select mnum, count(mnum)+1 cnts from meeting_study where state=20 group by mnum) b on a.mnum = b.mnum order by a.mnum) c on d.mnum = c.mnum order by d.mnum desc) f on e.unum=f.unum where f.category1=#{param1} order by f.mnum desc

select e.uNick,f.* from members e right outer join( select d.*, c.cnt from study d left outer join( select distinct a.mnum,nvl(b.cnts,'1') cnt from meeting_study a left outer join( select mnum, count(mnum)+1 cnts from meeting_study where state=20 group by mnum) b on a.mnum = b.mnum order by a.mnum) c on d.mnum = c.mnum order by d.mnum desc) f on e.unum=f.unum where f.category1=#{param1} and f.category2=#{param2} order by f.mnum desc

select e.uNick,f.* from members e right outer join( select d.*, c.cnt from study d left outer join( select distinct a.mnum,nvl(b.cnts,'1') cnt from meeting_study a left outer join( select mnum, count(mnum)+1 cnts from meeting_study where state=20 group by mnum) b on a.mnum = b.mnum order by a.mnum) c on d.mnum = c.mnum order by d.mnum desc) f on e.unum=f.unum where f.category1=#{param1} and f.category2=#{param2} and f.mName LIKE '%'||#{param3}||'%' order by f.mnum desc
select b.unick,a.* from study a, members b where a.unum=b.unum and a.category1=#{param1} and a.category2=#{param2}
select b.unick,a.* from study a, members b where a.unum=b.unum and a.category1=#{param1}

select e.uNick,f.* from members e right outer join( select d.*, c.cnt from study d left outer join( select distinct a.mnum,nvl(b.cnts,'1') cnt from meeting_study a left outer join( select mnum, count(mnum)+1 cnts from meeting_study where state=20 group by mnum) b on a.mnum = b.mnum order by a.mnum) c on d.mnum = c.mnum order by d.mnum desc) f on e.unum=f.unum order by f.mnum desc

select d.uNick as recuNick, c.* from members d right outer join( select a.*, b.uNick as senduNick from message a left outer join( select uNick, unum from members )b on a.sendunum=b.unum) c on c.receiveunum = d.unum order by c.msgnum desc
